r.s: Provides an implementation of the IMAP protocol
r.d: Provides an implementation of the IMAP4Rev1 protocol using PEAR's Net_Socket and Auth_SASL class.
r.n: - login method can authenticate with the following methods: DIGEST-MD4, CRAM-MD5, LOGIN and the login command - Fixed require_once bug - A lot of new mailbox-related functions - 2 Examples of use - fixes in protocol parser
